name: Java Snippets
short_description: Scripts and data to display snippets on your screensaver, mail signature, web-page etc. Over 270 Java snippets. Scripts for fetching news and RSS feeds from many tech sites (yahoo, freshmeat, sourceforge, dictionary, artima, ibm etc)
